cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Fund_Template__.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Fund_Template__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Fund_Template__.description: Junction object between tactic template and fund template. This object defines the valid fund types for the given tactic template.

LastActivityDate.description: The date when a User last did something related to the record.

cgcloud__Default__c.description: Indicates whether the current fund template is the default fund type for a tactic template. For each tactic template, only one default fund type can exist.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of Tactic Template Fund Template.
